objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Lightweight & Compact • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 71 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a soft, feminine aesthetic ideal for promoting elegant jewelry. The background uses a gentle radial gradient blending pastel pinks, enhanced by translucent white accent circles and swooping decorative curves. In the center lies a circular white frame outlined with a dotted rose border, containing a product image of intricate rose gold earrings. The main heading (`heading`) is prominently placed at the top in a bold serif font. Beneath it, a subheading (`subheading`) provides a descriptive touch in a graceful typeface. A glossy, gradient-filled circular badge holds the price text (`price`) in bold white. Below the product image, feature highlights are displayed in the `description` text layer. A rounded rectangular button (`cta_button`) with the label (`cta`) concludes the banner with a strong call to action.

**Color Palette:**
- Baby Pink: `#FFF0F5`
- Blush Rose: `#FFE4E1`
- Rose Gradient (Circle): `#FADADD` to `#E7A1B0`
- Deep Plum (Text): `#4A235A`, `#5D3A6D`
- Button Pink: `#D988B3`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of intricately designed earrings using a soft, feminine color palette. The primary color is a blush rose-gold (#F4A7B9), elegantly wrapping around the structure and framing each detail. This warm pink hue blends harmoniously with crystal-clear accents (#FFFFFF) and shimmering off-white stones (#F1F1F1), which reflect light to enhance brilliance. Subtle metallic pink highlights (#E88CA0) further enrich the dimensionality. The strategic juxtaposition of soft pink and sparkling white creates a luxurious, romantic feel. This palette—#F4A7B9 (rose-gold), #FFFFFF (diamond white), #F1F1F1 (soft shimmer), #E88CA0 (highlight pink)—is ideal for an advertisement banner promoting elegance and femininity.
